title: Unterschiedliche neue sehr nützliche Tischler oder Schreiner Risse
medium: album with nearly 1300 hand-colored etched and engraved ornaments, silhouetted and pasted down onto laid paper
attribution: Martin Engelbrecht (engraver and publisher), and (etcher-engravers) Andreas Hofer, Hieronymus Bölmann, Johann Christian Leopold, Anonymous German 18th Century
creditline: Gift of Peter and Evelyn Kraus
